class.name: GraphControl
class.brief_description: GraphControl is a [Container] control that provides the basic functionality to be used inside a [GraphEdit] control (as a child), meaning it will be selectable and transformable by the graph editor.
class.description: GraphControl allows to create your own custom nodes which can be used as a child of a [GraphEdit] node, but they won't be able to connect to other nodes. To create a custom node that can connect to other nodes, extend [GraphNode].

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the user can drag the GraphControl.
The offset of the GraphControl, relative to the scroll offset of the [GraphEdit]. [b]Note:[/b] You cannot use the position offset directly, as [GraphEdit] is a [Container].
If [code]true[/code], the user can resize the GraphControl. [b]Note:[/b] Dragging the handle will only emit the [signal resize_request] signal, the GraphControl needs to be resized manually.
If [code]true[/code], the user can select the GraphControl.

signal.name: close_request
signal.description: Emitted when the GraphControl is requested to be closed.

signal.name: dragged
signal.description: Emitted when the GraphControl is dragged.

signal.name: node_deselected
signal.description: Emitted when the GraphControl is deselected.

signal.name: node_selected
signal.description: Emitted when the GraphControl is selected.

signal.name: position_offset_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the GraphControl is moved.

signal.name: raise_request
signal.description: Emitted when the GraphControl is requested to be displayed over other ones. Happens on focusing (clicking into) the GraphControl.

signal.name: resize_request
signal.description: Emitted when the GraphControl is requested to be resized. Happens on dragging the resizer handle (see [member resizable]).
